title: WTB Specific HOF Backs, PSA only
author: GoBigRed

posts.post_title: WTB Specific HOF Backs, PSA only
posts.post_content:
Looking to buy one of three different specific backs in PSA 2, 2.5 or 3 for my "Better/Scarce" Back Run (Piedmont 350-46/42 thru Polar bear).

Sovereign 460/25

Sovereign 150/25

Cycle 460/25

Desired Card Characteristics:

HOF Player 

Centered

Nice-for-Grade

Crease-Free

Under $300



Please send front/rear photos to my email:  [url]arkansas2014@gmail.com[/url]

Have had several recent successful transactions with Steve Wilk (Wilkiebaby11) of Diamond Cardboard fame.

Steve
